column1:
share on x elizabeth hardy. jun 14 at 8:55 am share a memory of phillip wayne willis or send condolencesth to the family. thank you wayne for all the smiles you brought around with your presence, thank you for words of wisdom, thank you for being my friend, and my main memory of you, would be how when i first met you, i realized when wayne willis would put a 20$ bill on the pool table, it was hard to find a taker!!!! you would always try and raise it to $100, and still they were afraid, i would come to realize why after watching you play... you will be missed wayno. i love you my friend..:pray:comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x em eva miller. jun 13 at 8:29 pm the willis family is a great family !... sending a prayer for comfort .. and a reminder that god is the sourse of all comfort and hope, during our losses and sadness.(hugs)dencil eva miller. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x es estelle. jun 13 at 5:32 pm 1 file added to the album wayne willis comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x es estelle. jun 13 at 5:25 pm i always remember there being laughter around you. going to miss seeing you at the family events. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x rn rachel pisors (danny noonan)jun 13 at 9:26 am we spent a great weekend with wayne at bikes, blues & barbecue in fayetteville, a couple years back. wayne sure could ride. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ew elesia willis. jun 13 at 9:21 am think when tina an wayne. . oscar an i went on the float trip. an they were helping us out with the kids when oscar got hurt. lots of memories with them. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x wh whitedog65. jun 13 at 12:38 am i mostly knew wayne from shooting pool with him... he beat me 90% of the time, but i didn't mind, because wayne never was cocky, never rubbed it it. he would make the most fantastic shot, and never played it up, and i would just shake my head in disbelief. gonna miss ya, buddy. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 16. 4:00 pm - 8:00 pm millard-rekus family funeral
